meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jennifer Blanton Chris Gullo Alison Meermans Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6867.

td.p: Jennifer Blanton, an attorney from San Diego, California
Chris Gullo, a poet from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Alison Meermans, a fundraising project manager from Lakewood, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,600)

tr.td: ECON 101
COLORFUL SPORTS
EUROPEAN COUNTRY BY REGIONS
POTPOURRI
WILL YOU STILL FEED ME?
WHEN? IN '64

tr.td: Neither gaseous or solid but this term, meaning "in cash" or readily convertible into cash without a big loss of principal

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: You all remember the "wardrobe malfunction"?)
...

[NOTE: Chairman Michael Powell\'s actual quoted thought was "\'My day is going to suck tomorrow."]
AlisonWhat is the FCC?
$2,200
ChrisWhat is the FCC?
$12,000
JenniferWhat is the FCC?
$14,401
the FCC')
